trans-unit.source: Provides a set of `static` methods that extend the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> class.
The methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> class.
This means that they can be called like an instance method on any <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object.
Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with normal priority on the thread that the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> was created on.
The dispatcher that executes the delegate.
The delegate to execute, which takes no arguments and does not return a value.

An <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> object that represents the result of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherExtensions.BeginInvoke(System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher,System.Action)"></xref> operation.
action is `null`.
Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified priority on the thread that the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> was created on.
The dispatcher that executes the delegate.
The delegate to execute, which takes no arguments and does not return a value.
The execution priority of the delegate relative to other pending operations in the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> event queue.

An <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> object that represents the result of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherExtensions.BeginInvoke(System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher,System.Action,System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority)"></xref> operation.
action is `null`.
priority is not a valid .
Executes the specified delegate synchronously with normal priority on the thread that the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> was created on.
The dispatcher that executes the delegate.
The delegate to execute, which takes no arguments and does not return a value.
action is `null`.

Executes the specified delegate synchronously on the thread that the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> was created on, and stops execution after the specified time-out period.
The dispatcher that executes the delegate.
The delegate to execute, which takes no arguments and does not return a value.
The maximum time to wait for the operation to finish.
action is `null`.
priority is equal to .
priority is not a valid .

Executes the specified delegate synchronously with the specified priority on the thread that the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> was created on, and stops execution after the specified time-out period.
The dispatcher that executes the delegate.
